website_summaries.verdict: A quality BB cream that's safe and effective on sensitive skin.
pros: Lightweight on the skin, but provides quality coverage and color correction
Smooths over large pores and other imperfections
A little cream goes a long way
Hypoallergenic formula is safe for sensitive skin and eyes
cons: Some find the lightest shade is too dark for fair skin

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: I tried ELF BB cream, Missha, Tarte, Maybeline Dream Ready, Smashbox and several others. This one stood out among the pack. Elf and Missha were at the bottom of the list, and Smashbox was not as good as I expected either. PF had very good coverage, not shiny, improved my pores, and still felt light on the face.
customer_reviews.author: BusinessWoman

customer_reviews.title: ORANGE, Not For Light or Fair Skin
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this product because it ranked so well in the EWG database, but there's just nothing "light" about it, and it doesn't even remotely match my skin tone. I've used other BB creams listed as "light/medium" by other brands and had no problem at all, but this BB cream looks orange immediately upon application. It might work for more medium skin tones, but I definitely can't recommend it to anyone with fair or light skin.
customer_reviews.author: Cat LadyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY ORANGE
customer_reviews.text: I read so many great reviews of this and I really wanted to like it but it’s a total miss for me. I ordered it in the shade “Light/Medium” (which is the shade I normally wear I’m not super pale but not super tan either) and it was absolutely ORANGE on my face. If you’re darker skinned with warm undertones this may be a good fit. But if you’re anything less than very tan I would not recommend this at all
customer_reviews.author: Shalea

customer_reviews.title: My go to facial product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product its my go to facial product. When the Alba BB cream was discontinued I honestly didn't know what to replace it with. I like using organic product on my face since my skin is sensitive. This BB cream covers everything- I have a pretty even complexion but I also am in my 30's so I am getting some "spots". I typically only use this on my face with a bit of normal moisturizer beforehand. I have ordered this over and over again and will continue.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Ulin

customer_reviews.title: Medium-to-full coverage finish wears nicely on bare skin or over foundation
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, fragrance-free pressed powder with reliable broad-spectrum sun protection, but do not rely on it as your only source of sun protection unless you are willing to apply it liberally in a noticeable layer (a sheer dusting won't do it). The silky, almost creamy, texture, and the soft, luminous finish make it ideal for normal to dry skin. The non-chalky, medium-to-full coverage finish wears nicely on bare skin as well as over foundation. Physician's Formula typically does pressed powders well, and this keeps with tradition.
customer_reviews.author: M.Serrano

customer_reviews.title: I sought out to find a suitable replacement that was easily accessible and reasonably priced and came across this product ...
customer_reviews.text: I've always used 'Dr. Lewinn By Kinerase Instant Perfecting Bb Cream Sunscreen' as my go-to due to the quality of coverage and long-lasting flawless finish (and it's availability at Walgreens!). Apparently, that product is no longer available ANYWHERE. I sought out to find a suitable replacement that was easily accessible and reasonably priced and came across this product after trying out a few duds. It is the best BB cream I've ever used--and that includes my beloved Dr. Lewinn's. Note: May be too dark if you're very fair.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Liquid-cream texture offers foundation-like coverage to hide flaws
customer_reviews.text: This creamy liquid BB cream (which looks and acts more like foundation than anything else) has a satin-matte finish that's ideal for all skin types, including sensitive. You can expect medium coverage (which is more substantial than you get from most Western BB creams) and reliable, mineral-based broad-spectrum sun protection, which is a major plus for added anti-aging benefit. However, you must apply it liberally to get this benefit—something not everyone is willing to do with a foundation.
customer_reviews.author: M.Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup, just didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Might work great for some, convenient to use but broke me out (cystic pimples), but I have sensitive skin & it’s probably not the products fault. Good coverage, easy & smooth to apply, light feel & satin finish, not heavy like other cream makeup, no caking or settling into fine lines. This is the first PO brand makeup that didn’t work for me, I love the brand & use their healthy skin foundation. Refunded without a problem. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Impressive! I’ve used everything for my acne prone skin. I get painful boils when face product doesn’t agree with me so I was nervous to try this. I drank too much wine and decided to order it lol. I am so shocked! I didn’t have to use much to get even and full coverage. Like ladies, I didn’t have to use any foundation ALL DAY. I had to reapply after 5 hours of wearing, which is also impressive. I’ve tried sooooo many hypoallergenic bb creams and this is great, haven’t broken out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad...
customer_reviews.text: This product wasn't bad, but I found it to "drag" a little, even after having moisturizer on, and my skin isn't that dry. Coverage was ok, but I knew not to expect too much in advance. I just wasn't thrilled with it, but the reviews were pretty good, and the price point is great. I think if it were mixed with serum, if you're oily-skinned, and if you need very little coverage, it may work great for you.
customer_reviews.author: okie dokie

customer_reviews.title: I love this product because it's the only BB that still ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it's the only BB that still comes in a compact! Its even better that I can get in on Prime and not have to hunt for it in stores. I def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: erin elizabeth laferriere

customer_reviews.title: Not for light skin
customer_reviews.text: I wanted so much to love this product because it seems to be a perfect product - good SPF rating, great price, excellent recommendations from all the right people and institutions, but it is definitely not for light skins. My skin is porcelain/fair. "Light" here is misleading; the color is Medium. I wish the Physicians Formula made a lighter shade, please.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but darker than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have fair skin and ordered the lighter version of this. While I have no objection to the scent, texture, or coverage, it was still a shade or two darker than my skin so I couldn't use it. Fortunately, I have a teen daughter whose skin is a little more golden than mine, and it works well for her.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Hideous orange color, heavy texture
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this product because I have had great experiences with other beauty balm products and because of the good reputation Physicians Formula has. I applied it and was horrified by the color! It is not light/medium and doesn't resemble human skin at all. It goes on orange and has a thick, gooey texture that was unlike any BB cream I have used. I tossed the whole brand new tube because it's unusable. SO disappointed! This stuff is suitable only for pumpkins.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too orange for my skin, hydrates well but has no staying power.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had seen the reviews before I bought this based on the Amazon color picture. This BB cream has orange undertones and I need pink undertones. The picture looked more pink than orange so I was fooled. It left my skin feeling moist but seemed to stay on top of the skin instead of soaking in. If you blow your nose you get an orange tissue and do not even try to wear a white shirt. This BB cream does not wear well in a warm, humid climate. Still looking for a nice BB cream with pink undertones-that stays on.....
customer_reviews.author: Bkind2oldfolksW/Alz

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I am a medium tone, dark brown (gray) 48 year old woman. I have clear skin with some sun damage. This product provides protection and coverage that is perfect for me. It is layer-able. I prefer the powder version of the BB makeup, but tried this because of the price. I have no problem at all using it. I do use a moisturizer so it goes on silky smooth with an applicator. I do not like the applicator it comes with, which is a round disc. I bought some triangle shaped at the $ store & those work much better for me.
customer_reviews.author: PololvrTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Light/medium color may be darker than expected
customer_reviews.text: The light/medium color is darker than I expected. I was thinking it’d be between ivory and medium colored foundation. I need more of a nude color. I love Physician’s formula makeup!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: Very small amounts needed.. love this !! Very Matt when you apply it, good coverage so day.. No need to over spplh you will just be wasting product.. less is more with this
customer_reviews.author: Luvshopin

customer_reviews.title: Creamy,smooth, not oily.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have found. It goes on creamy and smooth, and covers flaws. I have light/fair, sensitive skin so the fact that this offers protection from the sun is important to me. Not oily either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received trial size instead of full size
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product; but received a “trial size” .25 oz container instead of the 1.2 oz full size product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Begging for Boscia BB Cream
customer_reviews.text: I knew what I wanted going in to the purchase - a full Boscisa bb cream, but they’ve discontinued it. I fell in love with it after receiving a sample from Sephora, and I’m never one for samples. I love Physician’s Formula, but it misses the mark for bb cream. It’s silky yet offers no coverage, and settles with a weird tint/hue. It’s nearly orange. I don’t love the scent either. It’s more of a glorified tinted moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Creamy and Light!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't a fan of their CC cream but this feels so much better on my skin! I have Lupus and 9 times out of 10, things hurt my skin. So far so good. Plus, I think Amazon by mistake sent me two bottles. Whoooo hooo!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ellinger-Hunt

customer_reviews.title: great product but wrong shade
customer_reviews.text: Even though the light/medium shade of the physician's formula tinted moisture is just perfect for my skin tone, this light/ medium shade is wayyy too dark and looks like I'm using a fake tanner that is a hint too orange. The texture, protection, and feeling are all nice though. just the wrong shade.
customer_reviews.author: BHM

customer_reviews.title: BB All-In-One
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product on Amazon because I couldn't find it in stores anymore. It is one of the best products to help with concealing my under eye bags. It goes on very smooth, blends well and keeps my face hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Dee McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect balance between moisturizer and foundation
customer_reviews.text: As a person with Lupus who should stay out of the sun (but doesn't always) this is wonderful. It's very moisturizing, and the color and coverage is great. There is no scent which I definitely prefer. I have tried several foundations for "mature" skin and found them to heavy, this is the perfect balance between moisturizer and foundation. This will be my go to from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine T.

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far
customer_reviews.text: Apparently my skin is this shade. It matched and blended perfectly. Give medium coverage, but not heavy looking. I like it so far, haven't worn it at the beach so not sure if it will sweat off, get shiny etc. So far so good and great convenient packaging which will be easy to throw in my bag for touch ups!
customer_reviews.author: Beauty addict

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly self contained!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much nicer than I expected! Lovely texture that spreads much more easily than expected. Lightweight and comes in an easy to open compact with sponge and mirror. Just wish there was a larger color selection. Very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Balmod

customer_reviews.title: Orange tint
customer_reviews.text: The medium shade has an orange/warm tint. I have a medium/cool skin tone, so I have to blend this BB cream with another shade in order to tone it down. The coverage is great, and the brand is cruelty free. That's what keeps me coming back to it!
customer_reviews.author: JulieK

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite foundation ever! It is creamy, it moisturizers my face, provides great coverage, including any blemishes I may have at the time, it doesnt clog my pores, and when wash my face it is easy to take off! Great profuct!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Stunning even after 8hrs
customer_reviews.text: My wife used this and after using the powder of this brand with great success. She tried this and it's great after 8 hours she looks perfect no Shine. Remained Matte. After dealing with clients shopping and helping out in the garage. She is absolutely satisfied and looks stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Troy A.

customer_reviews.title: Shade is Too Dark
customer_reviews.text: This light/medium color is much darker than the same which I have purchased before. Have they changed the formula? I can’t use it as it makes me look like I have a tan just on my face. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Domestic Deb

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Love P. Formula, I wasn't able to find it at my beauty store. And bc I have prime, I decided ordering online. I posted pictures, this is a cheap fake version. Do not buy!. judge for urself. Product on face looks like cake!. It is lighter than original and super soft when using sponge for the first time. Pics of fake one (lightest shade) vs my old one .
customer_reviews.author: astrid

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: The worst BB cream I ever bought. I threw it in the trash! Was white and pasty- made my skin look horrible- would rather wear nothing at all than this! Also cream seemed old
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: Great formula, but more “true medium” than “light/medium
customer_reviews.text: Great formula, but more “true medium” than “light/medium.” I have to mix it with a light foundation to match my skintone, so not really the morning timesaver I was looking for. Wish there were a “light” option.
customer_reviews.author: RTee

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell on sealed product!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not really sure what happened here. Tube was smaller than expected... but it came boxed and sealed .... used it this morning and the smell of this stuff is atrocious! I’m not sure if the product is old and has soured, or if this is its actual scent ? I may return.
customer_reviews.author: FR

customer_reviews.title: My fave!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite everyday foundation. I have dry skin, so I use another moisturizer and primer underneath, but this gives me great coverage that can be layered. Stays all day, even in humidity.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Love the natural looking coverage with spf
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage and very natural looking. Pretty decent quality ingredients and like the fact it has SPF in it. I mix it with some moisturizing cream to soften it up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Polly026

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The only reason for 4 stars is that it is light/medium I would love just light. However if applied lightly it's perfect for lighter skin. Very moisturizing and even can go out with just that applied to my face. Side note even tho it's moisturizing I still use another moisturizer under do to extremely dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This cream is thicker than I expected and was too orange for my skin tone. I wish they offered more colors.
customer_reviews.author: steven brown

customer_reviews.title: Light/Medium is more like Medium/Dark
customer_reviews.text: This was more like a foundation than a BB cream. The Light/Medium color is much darker than it appears here and was no good for me! I instantly washed it off and was super disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: DRYS MY SKIN
customer_reviews.text: Does not moisturize my skin and dries it out by the end of a work day. Initially it looks ok, covers the fine lines etc but it doesn't have the lasting effect the product claims, at least not on me. I won't be buying this again. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen B.

customer_reviews.title: Literally obsessed
customer_reviews.text: This bb cream is the absolute best. I’ve tried a million and always come back to this trusty one. It is definitely the best value and works much better than pricier brands. I use this and then just a powder foundation and my skin looks flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked like a bad spray tan
customer_reviews.text: Get a lighter color that you normally would! Gets very dark from oxidation. I’m on the pale side, and I ordered a light shade, ended up looking like I had a bad spray tan!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Less than par
customer_reviews.text: I have loved all my Physician's Formula products, and the coverage is fine, but this cream is incredibly runny and much is lost in the sink before applying. Reminds of me ketchup coming out runny, so you have to 'discard' the first squirt or two.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Brouillard

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking BB cream
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and lightweight. I usually wear buff beige or ivory shades and this wasn’t too dark for me, as others said. Just probably wouldn’t be good for pink undertones/really light skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neary replaces my foundation
customer_reviews.text: This almost replaces foundation and looks as good as most of them....it is a little drying but a little moisturizer 1st helps....really it looks very good
customer_reviews.author: Amy O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Best full coverage moisturizing non caking radiant foundation
customer_reviews.text: Again I tried every foundation from lancome so two-faced at everything and this is the smoothest most moisturizing best blending full coverage foundation that leaves a glow to your skin next setting holiday absorb setting powder super easily and leave your face flawless
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Cariello

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for an everyday makeup, i first use a moisturizer for oil skin, and then this bb cream and works perfect, it also has a light coverage but enough for your daily makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Katiusca Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Watered down lotion with a little tint
customer_reviews.text: This is nothing more than a water down lotion not even a water downed creme. Way to thin, doesn't cover well, no moisturizing affect. I see no value at all. Only ordered because my fav was out of stock every where. I pray they are not discontinuing but either way I will not be buying this product again
customer_reviews.author: Karin S

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to shake before applying
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of BB cream. This is the 1st one that I ever had to shake before applying. Color is perfect for me. Most are too light. I like that it is spf 30. Feels a little dry.
customer_reviews.author: Holli

customer_reviews.title: My fave
customer_reviews.text: Physicians formula is my favoritea! I've been using it for years. It's affordable and is the only line I've found to work with my oily combination skin. After a long day it doesn't look smeary or cakey and that's been my struggle. The color line is limited but you can now tailor the color with their shade adjuster.
customer_reviews.author: Alliwndr

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertized
customer_reviews.text: Got a trial size of 0.25 ounces instead if the 1.23 ounce bottle
customer_reviews.author: roberto

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it serves more than one purpose which saves time. In addition I have not had my face burned since I have used it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Troyer

customer_reviews.title: Orange
customer_reviews.text: Only purchase it your skin color is orange. I purchased the light/medium shade and am amazed that the color is orange. It is greasy and leaves an orange tint on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Physicians Formula Super BB All-in-1 Beauty Balm Cream, Light/Medium, 1.2 Ounce
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy spreading cream and easy to apply. Coverage is okay, a little thin if not applying a lot.
customer_reviews.author: BlueBird

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Works great, very light, easy to spread. Among the best I've ever used. It even smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sits nice on skin
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it sits on my skin but I got a shade too dark so unfortunately I don’t use often
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I really like this spf level and the ingredients. But you have to use a ton to even basically cover your face, and the bottom line hue was more orangey.
customer_reviews.author: H. R. L.

customer_reviews.title: Protects, Moisturizes, Spreads Easily — But TOO (ORANGE-Y) DARK!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, except for the color: too (ORANGE-Y) dark — and I live in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Bee

customer_reviews.title: Magnifies fine lines
customer_reviews.text: The color is very pasty light. And it does so k into fine lines as the day goes on with its chalkyness.
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Small Tube.
customer_reviews.text: Not much in the tube. But good coverage and color. Easy to blend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would order again
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Does everything the label promises. Only thing I've noticed is that a few times I've needed a light base moisturizer because the BB cream wasn't enough. Other than that I have no complaints. I think this will be great in the summer. Provides medium coverage without feeling heavy
customer_reviews.author: McDiven

customer_reviews.title: Good product, container not so great
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, hate the container. It squeezes out large amounts at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Hite

customer_reviews.title: Orange.
customer_reviews.text: It was nice and light, but as others have said, has a very orange tint to it. I’m so sad. I am now shopping for another cleaner BB cream.
customer_reviews.author: JVonger

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: The color seems a little dark for light/fair but so far it isn’t too bad once applied. You also don’t need a lot to get a decent coverage.
customer_reviews.author: EDesie

customer_reviews.title: Great sun screen too
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Great coverage. Long lasting. Great for days in the sun too. Wore it while on vacation in FL and face never burned.
customer_reviews.author: Dana G.

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this cream. I use it after I moisturize my face and neck. It helps to cover the redness and unevenness of my skin as well as giving a glow and I think there is a sunscreen in it.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this makeup! Not greasy, creamy with good coverage. This is my second purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I add a dab of mineral tint to get the color I like. Nice light feel.
customer_reviews.author: Deb McNulty

customer_reviews.title: Good for lightweight coverage
customer_reviews.text: It’s great everyday light coverage. It doesn’t last all day though
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Great natural ingredients and higher SPF
customer_reviews.text: Just like BB but better - matte w/o heaviness or chalkiness plus more natural healing ingredients and higher SPF (30!). I will use for outdoor recreational wear when no makeup just won't do!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Y

customer_reviews.title: It burn
customer_reviews.text: I put on the back of my hand. as many people said it was very oranh. I had it on my skin for about 30 min. ihad a burning feeling and said to my self no way is this going on my face!!!
customer_reviews.author: m smith

customer_reviews.title: Its alright
customer_reviews.text: Thia foundation is too dark, doesn't spread well, drys out my skin and has crummy coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Clark

customer_reviews.title: Nice light to medium coverage
customer_reviews.text: Nice shade for my fair complexion. This is light to medium coverage but still with pretty nice finish if dabbed on not rubbed in. However, I'd prefer a dewier finish-- a little more glow and moisturized look but in the meantime this is a staple..
customer_reviews.author: Decisions1

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My favorite so far, makes my skin look flawless. Lightweight but still provides coverage to even out skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: L. Adamiec

customer_reviews.title: This one applies easily and is a good color for my complexion
customer_reviews.text: Some BB creams are too oily and rub off in little "balls". This one applies easily and is a good color for my complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. F.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe just a dud?
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased this before and it was great. This one is pure oil or water...defective, and although I have never returned anything before, I would have, had I not missed the time frame for return.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Best around
customer_reviews.text: I love this bb cream! I ordered it a little too dark so I just look a little tan but it blends nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget S

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Horrible consistency. Feels thick and uncomfortable. Come see off on everything. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Page

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage but caused break outs
customer_reviews.text: This product did a very good job at matching my skin tone and it covers pretty well. But what I don't like about it is that the cream is not "light". It's a little too heavy for me, cakey appearance under certain lights/sun. And it made me break out.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a sheer coverage
customer_reviews.text: I like this for a sheer coverage for simple days.
customer_reviews.author: DMc

customer_reviews.title: Great for combination skin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff makes my combination skin look moisturized but not oily. It lasted all day with just one powder touch up.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Brinkley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this BB cream! It goes on smooth and feels a light as a powder.
customer_reviews.author: A. F. Rab

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: This was WAYYY to dark for my skin. The color is odd. The coverage is okay for BB cream. Pretty disappointed. :(
customer_reviews.author: Katy Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Plan on using this as a summer color if you are fair skinned!
customer_reviews.author: Angel E

customer_reviews.title: Best natural coverage with SPF
customer_reviews.text: I love physicians formula. This sunscreen/moisturizer/foundation is the best combination cream. Goes on easily and STAYS on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Wible

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I didnt like it not at all what i was exspecting also the colors off it was way to light n burnt my face
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Foundation
customer_reviews.text: Very good foundation. Covers well and diner break my skin out.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Nice coverage
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage and doesn’t get cakey and even with wearing a mask all day, it doesnt rub off entirely in the mask..
customer_reviews.author: rhoda

customer_reviews.title: Decent BB cream
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. I have dry skin and it lasted on my face for a while. Although I am naturally tan and this fit me. I do not recommend if you have a fair complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Brithany Banderas

customer_reviews.title: Thick and orange-y
customer_reviews.text: Way too thick, even using very little. Orange color also. Very disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: jcofield91

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I like it! Good coverage! Good for base or alone.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: something wrong.
customer_reviews.text: opened the makeup, it is all granular, SANDY looking. I buy this makeup all the time. This is not right. Very Disappointed. Waste of money. I purchased online because my CVS didn't have it. I've been through at least 4 of these in the past year. None have been like this.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime W Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Great cream
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cream. I use it everyday whether alone or under my makeup. It definitely provides a light coverage and my skin looks glowing with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Howard

customer_reviews.title: This is my absolute favorite foundation and the SPF is a bonus
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite foundation and the SPF is a bonus. I wear this over a lotion and with the Physicians Formula powder for a smooth finish.
customer_reviews.author: Beata McKee

customer_reviews.title: Good for break out prone
customer_reviews.text: Does not break me out, while almost every other foundation does. Lacks in coverage for red sky n, but would be perfect for semi-even skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: I love the coverage of the BB cream
customer_reviews.text: I love the coverage of the BB cream, however, it is not for fair skin. Light is more of like tan medium.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Spills from the bottom
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two and both of them ended up leaking from the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Sauls

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Dry, Covers Well
customer_reviews.text: Most beauty creams leave my skin feeling very dry. I like this particular brand because it doesn't! The color works with my very light skin tone and, just the fact it doesn't feel dry is enough for me to give it 5 Stars AND to buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: LBDDiaries

customer_reviews.title: Less time to apply makeup n so much easier.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a godsend for me as that is all I use n no more creams or liquid makeup n face powder. Less to pack when traveling now, just that all in one compact.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Ogura

product_meta.title: Physicians Formula Super BB All-in-1 Beauty Balm Cream, Light/Medium, 1.2 Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:Cream, Light/MediumWhy is super bb super? The high-tech multi-tasking formulas combine uva/uvb protection, brightening antioxidants, moisturizing and firming botanicals and perfecting optical diffusers for super-powerful skin care + makeup benefits. All-in-1 miracle cream ultra-bendable and lightweight cream effortlessly glides on, instantly infusing moisture, refining skin's surface and providing protection from the environment. Skin looks and feels smooth, glowing & naturally flawless. Ultra-versatile beauty balm simplifies your morning beauty routine by delivering the benefits of moisturizer, foundation & SPF protection in one easy to use product .
feature_bullets: BB CREAM BASE: All the hydrating and imperfection blurring benefits of a primer or tinted moisturizer, but with greater color correction--Super BB Cream delivers sheer coverage for a soft, glowing, natural look and lasting skin benefits.

TINTED MOISTURIZER WITH SPF, but with increased skin balancing sheer coverage, plus priming, concealing, and brightening. Evens skin tone, while blurring imperfections and enhancing the natural appearance of skin for a flawless, woke up like this look.

PUT YOUR BEST FACE FORWARD: From primers to highlighters, we offer a full face of makeup to help you build a foundation for any look, and all without irritating ingredients or harsh additives. Just long-wearing, lushly pigmented, quality cosmetics.

Physician's Formula offers a full line of skin care and makeup for sensitive skin, including mascaras, lipsticks, concealers, eyeliners, eyeshadow palettes, bb creams, bronzers & primers. Our products are hypoallergenic & safe for sensitive skin and eyes.
HEALTHY BEAUTY PRODUCTS: Every one of our products is hypoallergenic, safe for sensitive skin & eyes, & created without any of the 150+ known harsh ingredients found in other personal care items.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
